Quote by Auguste Rodin

Where did I learn to understand sculpture? In the woods by looking at the trees, along roads by observing the formation of clouds, in the studio by studying the model, everywhere except in the schools.

Auguste Rodin[1]

3D Printing

Shapeways offer printing services, but you can also purchase your own 3D Printer[33] for quicker prototyping

3D Printing Cast Metals via Shapeways

Play Video[35]

Why This Is the Best 3D Printer - Comparing ALL My Printers!!!

Play Video[37]

Business Practice: Shapeways Laser Printing

Sell[38] your 3D models through Printing on Demand (POD, printing only when someone pays for your product) at Shapeways[39] and similar 3d print shops. Shapeways created shapejs[40] a programmable product creator with many examples in JavaScript[41], this can be used to generate a large number of unique products (antique coin pendants, tiny statues of art in public domain, odd bobble heads, skeleton wallets, waveform rings, UPC/QR code bracelets or keychain doodads.).

Business Practice: Scanned Model Sales

You are not limited to digital models, you can experiment with 3d scanners[42] as well. Take a look at the Shapeways Marketplace[43] for more ideas.

Explaining 3D Scanning

Play Video[45]

Best 3D Scanners 2019

Play Video[47]
